title: Magia Russica Russian Animation in Soviet Times (2004)
description:
Magia Russica / Magic Russik

Year: 2004
Country: Israel / Russia
Genre: Documentary / Animation
Running time: 96 minutes.
Translation: No
Russian subtitles: none

Directed by: Jonathan and Mary Suhr / Yonathan & Masha Zur

Cast: Garry Bardin
Iosif Boyarsky
Eduard Nazarov
Yuri Norstein
Alexander Tatarsky
Fedor Khitruk

Description: A documentary about the history of Russian and Soviet animation. The movie was shown at 45 film festivals, animation festivals and festivals of documentary film around the world. A more detailed description is on the English Wikipedia and the official website, where you can also buy the DVD.

Extras. Information: This version with English subtitles.
